title: Paris 2 Panthéon-Assas University
summary: Panthéon-Assas University (French: Université Panthéon-Assas; [ynivɛʁsite pɑ̃teɔ̃ asas]), also referred to as Assas ([asas]) or Paris 2 (French: Paris II[paʁi dø]), is a university in Paris, acting faculty of law of Sorbonne University and often described as the top law school of France.[1][2][3]
